Primary Contact: Rena Warren, Executive Director and Instructor; Phone: 250.899.6381
Alternate Contact: Elana Bizovie, Administrative Assistant, Cool Arts Society; Phone: 250.899.6381; Email: admin@coolarts.ca
Service Details: - Provides fine arts opportunities for adults with developmental disabilities living in the Central Okanagan- Believes everyone should have the opportunity to express themselves through the arts and that disabilities should not interfere with this choice- Creates opportunities to make art, provides classes and learning opportunities- Creates a supportive fine arts environment for participants to exhibit or perform, and be part of the larger arts community
